A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This just seemed disjointed and was not true to the series.  It was all over the place and felt a little cartoon like in its delivery.  I don't mind seeing characters dying but to destroy Luke and make him weak and wimpy was a disservice to the fan base.  I hope that this director never touches another star wars movie again!  I also hope Disney steps away from something it clearly does not know how to develop ( a good believable story line)  This movie looked like and felt like it was made by committee
